duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize evidence-based practice for nursing interventions in ambulatory care settings, telephone encounters, and electronic communications.
Provide safe and effective administration of medications and patient procedures in compliance with policies.
Recognize changes in patient status and respond effectively to optimize patient outcomes.
Collaborate with healthcare team to optimize patient care and outcomes across the care continuum.
Facilitate the transition of care for patients and families across settings through regular communication.

education_certification.credential: Current State of Illinois Registered Nurse licensure
